name: Under Ground Storage
desc:
There is an underground base deep within this planet. Its resource reserves allow it to be self-sustaining for several cycles without outside connection.

It provides a stability bonus to the colony.

name: Military Zone
desc: A military-restricted colony, denying all needs for <Drag> <Luxuries> <Organs>, with a maximum number of industries <+2>.

name: Space Farm
desc:
This place has an artifact ecosystem that, by inputting energy and inorganic compounds, can continuously produce organic products.

Provides <Food> and <Organic> production according to colony size.

name: Extinctive Virus
desc:
The environment is being devastated by a synthetic virus aimed at destroying all organic life. Consequently, all outdoor activities must be conducted under full protection.

This has greatly decreased the production capacity of all industries.
